attributes.action: give the money which would be used for replacing the TRIDENT nuclear fleet to Cancer research.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This money instead of being wasted on a something we shall never use and if we did would kill many people, should be used instead for the Benefit of thousands of people. it could be used not only for research and development of drugs but also givin to sufferers and families to ease the pain and misery cancer brings.
